name: Tanssi Network
description: Tanssi empowers developers to deploy sovereign, customizable appchains anchored by Ethereum-grade security, eliminating traditional infrastructure complexities. Purpose-built for demanding applications like Real-World Assets (RWAs), stablecoins, and advanced coordination protocols, Tanssi delivers a complete, production-ready environment through decentralized, automated orchestration. This includes everything from validator management and rotating sequencers to integrated RPCs, indexers, and explorersâ€”all provisioned out-of-the-box.
